His wife, Li Sao, carried their families with their families and moved southward. They crossed the Yellow River, Poyang Lake, crossed the Wuyi Mountain, came to Fujian, Guangdong, Jiangxi at the junction of Kudo. Corrupt officials excessive son, listen to the eunuch field Tianqi Zi Yan, Lee family as killing father and enemy, chasing Ge Fuju, waiting for revenge. Lee family and the relocation of Han Chinese south in the production and life, and the local mountain people had a serious conflict, which also had a deep feeling. Luosheng and the Seventeen Mother after several twists and turns, eventually married. Too desperate to kill Lee sister, the opposite was saved sister. Because of Ngau Tau Tang and two stunned Huang Chao, Ge Fuju was Tang Jun Bing suppression. Han Chinese and mountain people unite with their enemies, repel Tang Bing. Chinese and Han died remonstrance Emperor Tang Li Ye. Li Ye recovered his life, thanks Ge vine concave to the people, so that Hakkas Han immigrants live there multiply, torpedo handed.
imdb.title: The Great Southern
